name: Liberation of Anidom
description:
This is a game for the N8JAM event, we hope you have fun playing our small game

Developer Notes:
We sadly didn't have enough time to include everything we wanted and polish the game, working across distant time zones with each one of us having our own life stuff was difficult. Also, your computer might say the game is a virus, this is a false positive since antivirus protection softwares have difficulty with this kind of packaged Python code. Don't worry about the virus warning (FOR THIS GAME). 

People who worked on the project:
Zeperox: User Interface,  Mechanical Programming, Game Design
Cthethan: Art & Animation, Engine Programmer, Game Design
